channel.title: Need a way to stop massers
channel.description: i want a way to stop massers ( im not the greatest coder so you might have to explain alot...like tell me where to go and add something is easy...) this may be asking alot but is there anyway for the server to warn them a couple of times then send them to like some island which they cant get off? i have an island base so it maby like the pc isle... i used satan isle base...[br][size=1]Posted on: September 16, 2007, 12:41:59 PM[/size][hr]im not syaing i want what i asked up there but any way to stop them would be nice
